hero.title: Learning Math,
hero.description: "Smart Worksheets" is a social initiative designed to provide parents and teachers with a simple, free, and professional tool for personalized math practice.
hero.subdescription: The system covers math topics taught in grades 1-6, enabling focused practice at every level.

howItWorks.title: How Does It Work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to a perfect worksheet

step1.title: Choose a Topic
step1.description: Addition, multiplication, fractions, or percentages? Select the generator that matches your child's level.

step2.title: Customize
step2.description: Adjust the number range, quantity of exercises, and difficulty level to fit your exact needs.

step3.title: Print and Solve
step3.description: Click "Print Sheet" and receive a clean, organized worksheet, including a separate answer key.

mission.title: Why Did We Create This Site?

background.label: Background:
background.text: The system was built from the understanding that there aren't always enough practice materials tailored to every child. We wanted to create a simple, accessible tool that allows parents and teachers to easily generate worksheets.

mission.problem: We saw that there isn't always enough appropriately leveled practice for every child. We wanted to create a situation where children can practice with new sheets until they feel confident in the material - unlimited and free.

method.label: The Method:
method.text: The exercises are built gradually from simple to complex, allowing adaptation to the child's level and progress at their own pace.

mission.infiniteText: . Each click of "Refresh Sheet" creates new exercises, so you can practice over and over until success.

free.title: Free Forever
free.description: We believe that basic education and practice should be accessible to everyone. The site is open for free use by parents, teachers, and students.

stats.title: By the Numbers
stats.subtitle: Data about the system and its usage

coverage.title: Curriculum Coverage
coverage.description: The generators cover math topics taught in elementary school grades 1-6, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, fractions, percentages, and geometry.

personalized.title: Personalized Practice
personalized.description: Each student progresses at their own pace. The system allows adjusting difficulty level, number range, and exercise type to each child's specific situation.

repetition.title: Repetition and Reinforcement
repetition.description: Research shows that repeated practice is key to mastering mathematical skills. Creating new sheets allows practicing over and over without fear of memorizing answers.

progressive.title: Progressive Learning
progressive.description: Exercises are built gradually from simple to complex, so children can progress at their own pace and build self-confidence.

feedback.title: Immediate Feedback
feedback.description: Each sheet includes a separate answer key, allowing children or parents to check answers immediately and identify recurring mistakes.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Create personalized worksheets for free - no registration required
